alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:39PM CDT until July 01 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Limestone County in north central Alabama... Western Morgan County in north central Alabama... Southeastern Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 239 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Decatur, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Moulton, Priceville, Trinity, Falkville, Somerville, Mooresville, Speake and Caddo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
